text: Yeroo Rabbiin nabiyyoota irraa “waan ani kitaabaafi ogummaa irraa isiniif kennee, ergasii ergamaan waan isinii wajjin jiru dhugoomsu isinitti dhufe, akka isatti amantaniifi isa tumsitanu” (jechuun) waadaa qabate [yaadadhu](Rabbiinis) "mirkaneessitanii? Sana irrattis waadaa kiyya qabdanii?" jedhe[Isaan] "mirkaneessine" jedhan; (Rabbiinis) “Ragaa ta’aa; anis warra isinii wajjin ragaa ta’u irraayi” jedhe
